generatedPrompts.frontCover:
Flat 2D illustration for a greeting card. A dreamy fantasy beach scene where the world is humorously dedicated to orange chicken. Lao Lao and Jordan are depicted as cartoon characters based on the reference photo. They are sitting together on a whimsical picnic blanket on the sand. Jordan is playfully trying to feed a piece of Panda Express orange chicken to Lao Lao, who is laughing with a happy, surprised expression. The beach sand is a soft, golden orange hue, and the ocean waves gently rolling in are the color of orange chicken sauce with white foam crests. In the sky, fluffy white clouds are shaped like pieces of orange chicken, and the sun is a glowing takeout box. The overall aesthetic is magical, ethereal, and very funny. In the center of the image, the text "Happy Birthday, Lao Lao" is written in a beautiful, readable handwritten cursive script.

REFINEMENT NOTE: A rough draft of this exact image is provided as reference. Create a high-quality final version that:
- Maintains the exact same composition, character positions, and overall design
- Enhances details, textures, and color vibrancy
- Corrects any minor imperfections or artifacts
- Adds professional polish while staying true to the draft
- Think of this as the "final art" version of the provided sketch

ORIGINAL CONTEXT TO MAINTAIN:
- To: Lao Lao
- From: Jordan
- Relationship: Lao Lao is Jordan's girlfriend
- Personal Traits to incorporate: put us on a pretty beach with panda express orange chicken
generatedPrompts.backCover: Minimalist 2D flat illustration for a greeting card back cover. A dreamy fantasy beach scene background with a soft pastel color palette. The bottom half is a soft golden orange sand texture. The top half is a light sky-blue blending into a soft peach horizon. A single, small, fluffy white cloud shaped like a piece of fried chicken floats in the upper left corner. The design is very sparse, with ample negative space. The bottom-right corner is intentionally left completely empty. Professional polish, enhanced details, vibrant colors, full-bleed.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Subtle 2D flat illustration for a greeting card's left interior panel. A full-bleed background depicting a dreamy fantasy beach scene. The bottom third is a soft golden-orange sand texture. The upper two-thirds is a calm ocean with gentle waves the color of orange sauce, topped with delicate white foam crests. A few small, whimsical bubbles float up from the waves. The overall decoration is subtle and confined to the background, creating a serene and magical atmosphere without any central focal points. No people or text. Professional polish, enhanced details, vibrant colors.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior:
Minimalist 2D flat illustration for a greeting card's right interior panel, designed to frame a message. A full-bleed background of soft, light cream-colored parchment texture. The decorative elements are confined to the top-left and bottom-right corners. In the top-left corner, there is a small, artful splash of orange sauce with a tiny, fluffy, chicken-nugget-shaped cloud next to it. In the bottom-right corner, a few soft golden-orange sand grains are scattered with a couple of whimsical, glowing bubbles. The large central area is clear and open, providing elegant space for a handwritten message. Professional polish, enhanced details, vibrant colors.

Display this exact text in elegant, clearly readable handwritten script: "To my wonderful Lao Lao,

Happy Birthday! You know, I was going to buy you a ladder for your birthday, but then I realized you don't need one with those long legs of yours. I hope your day is as amazing as you are!

All my love,
Jordan"
